title: Example Queries Gallery
description: Curate 15-20 example SQL queries across categories: Batting (career stats, phase analysis, matchups), Bowling (economy, wickets, death overs), Team (squad analysis, predicted XIs), Advanced (clustering, percentiles, benchmarks). Each query has a title, description, and one-click Run button. Organized by difficulty: beginner, intermediate, advanced. Andy Flower provides domain review for cricket accuracy. Depends on TKT-B and TKT-C.
